#include <iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	long long int t,s,i,l;
	string str;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>str;
        l=str.length();
        i=str.length()/2;
        for(long long k=i-1;k>=0;k--)
        cout<<str[k];
        for(long long k=l-1;k>i-1;k--)
        cout<<str[k];
        cout<<"\n";
    }
	return 0;
}
